channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: First domino in national redistricting fight likely to fall with Texas GOP poised for vote on maps
item.description: Texas’ Republican-led legislature is expected to approve new congressional maps that add five new House seats that the GOP could win.

item.title: Immigrants seeking lawful work and citizenship are now subject to ‘anti-Americanism’ screening
Even at the grocery store, Texas troopers don’t let Democrats out of sight after walkout
